verbose_text: We show here that systemically administered TNF-alpha was sufficient, alone, to produce acute impairments and is robustly expressed after systemic challenge with LPS [XREF_BIBR] and after inflammatory trauma such as the tibial fracture used in POCD models [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: TNF-alpha was sufficient, alone, to produce acute impairments and is robustly expressed
